price: Ka ce: "Ya Allah, Mai ƙãga halittar sammai da ƙasã, Masanin gaibi da bayyane! Kai ne ke yin hukunci a tsakãnin bãyinKa a cikin abin da suka kasance sunã sãɓa wa jũna a cikinsa."
arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهُمَّ فَاطِرَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ عَٰلِمَ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِ أَنتَ تَحۡكُمُ بَيۡنَ عِبَادِكَ فِي مَا كَانُواْ فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِفُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: quli al-lahuma fāṭira al-samāwāti wal-arḍi ʿālima al-ghaybi wal-shahādati anta taḥkumu bayna ʿibādika fī mā kānū fīhi yakhtalifūna
